name: stylus-supremacy
description: Make your Stylus files look great again.

scripts.test-watch: nodemon --watch edge --watch spec --ext js,json,styl --ignore spec/*-debugging.json --ignore spec/*-formatted.styl ./test/runner.js
scripts.docs: browserify --transform [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --require lodash --require ./edge/format.js:format --require ./edge/createCodeForHTML.js:createCodeForHTML | uglifyjs > docs/format.js && node edge/reviseDocumentation.js
scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run docs && node ./edge/reviseTypeDefinition.js && git commit --allow-empty --message="Updated the static site" -- docs/*.* edge/index.d.ts
